analysis.summary: Michael Wolff reports to Jeffrey Epstein about observing Steve Bannon in London, noting Bannon's paranoia about media exposure and his efforts to cultivate relationships with Trump and French right-wing figures regarding refinancing the National Front Party, which receives significant Russian funding.
